info.name: Gizmodo Media Group Clean
info.description: Removes unnecessary items and cross site content from page and centers content. Makes the navigation fixed so it scrolls with the page. Works across Gwaker US sites.
info.additionalInfo:
Update 1.1:


- Forgot a sidebar on Kotaku

Initial Release v 1.0:

- Navigation Scrolls
- Removed Sidebar
- Centered Content
- Removed shared news items
